statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, last_updated FROM inventory_tracking;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock < stock_threshold;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_threshold FROM inventory_tracking WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock > stock_threshold
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT product_name, last_updated FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY current_stock ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM inventory WHERE stock_quantity > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name FROM inventory ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity, last_stock_update FROM inventory WHERE stock_quantity < 5 ORDER BY last_stock_update ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, supplier_name, stock_quantity, last_stock_update FROM inventory WHERE stock_quantity > 100 ORDER BY last_stock_update DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, COUNT(*) as total_count FROM inventory GROUP BY product_name, supplier_name HAVING total_count > 1
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE last_stock_update BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, COUNT(alert_id) as alerts_count FROM inventory LEFT JOIN stock_alerts ON inventory.id = stock_alerts.product_id GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY alerts_count DESC
SELECT supplier_name, MAX(stock_quantity) as max_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY supplier_name ORDER BY max_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT last_updated, product_name FROM inventory ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_availability WHERE available = TRUE;
SELECT product_id, stockout_reason FROM stockouts ORDER BY reported_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT inventory.product_name, stock_availability.available FROM inventory INNER JOIN stock_availability ON inventory.id = stock_availability.product_id WHERE stock_availability.available = TRUE;

SELECT inventory.product_name, stockouts.stockout_reason, stockouts.reported_at FROM inventory LEFT JOIN stockouts ON inventory.id = stockouts.product_id WHERE stockouts.reported_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY stockouts.reported_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 UNION SELECT * FROM stock_availability WHERE available = FALSE ORDER BY last_checked ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_level FROM Products WHERE current_stock_level < stock_threshold;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE shipped = TRUE ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_level, stock_threshold FROM Products JOIN Stockouts ON Products.product_id = Stockouts.product_id WHERE resolved = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_level FROM Products WHERE current_stock_level < stock_threshold;

SELECT Customers.customer_name, Orders.order_date, Products.product_name FROM Customers INNER JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.order_id INNER JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE Orders.shipped = true;
SELECT customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_name, stockout_date, resolved FROM Stockouts INNER JOIN Products ON Stockouts.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE resolved = false ORDER BY stockout_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM inventory_items WHERE current_stock < stock_threshold;
SELECT location_name, area_code FROM warehouse_locations WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM inventory_items WHERE current_stock > 50 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT event_date, event_reason FROM stockout_events WHERE item_id = 5 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE current_stock > stock_threshold;
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM inventory_items WHERE current_stock < 10;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_locations WHERE location_name LIKE '%East%';
SELECT item_name, current_stock, stock_threshold FROM inventory_items ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT item_name, stock_level, transaction_date FROM inventory_items JOIN stock_history ON inventory_items.item_id = stock_history.item_id;
